The aim of mental health care is to help people recover.

It is based on psychosocial rehabilitation techniques.

Recovery includes the development of skills that enable people to learn to live with or cope with the three levels of disability mentioned above.

question.question: Which of the following is a key component of psychosocial rehabilitation in mental health care?
question.option_b: Focus on eliminating all symptoms immediately
question.option_c: Development of skills to cope with disability in school, work, income, housing, and social life
